title: Recore E3 2016 Trailer - Kinda Funny Reacts
description:
Subscribe for all your E3 2016 updates! https://www.youtube.com/c/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Tim and Colin breakdown the Recore E3 2016 Trailer!

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation

transcript_chunks.text: E3 2016 is happening kind of funny is going all out with Let's Plays and reaction videos all week long subscribe now at youtube.com/ kind of funny games to not miss a thing what's up guys I'm Tim Gettys this is the illustrious Colin morard you taught me that word good I'm I'm glad it's a fantastic word um now so right now we are here on youtube.com/ kind of funny games covering all the E3 stuff including recor here's the very surprising trailer at least it was surprising to me yeah didn't expect this yeah it's very stylish um I mean I expected to see recor at the show but um and we know the release dat had leaked or rumors of the relase DAT had leaked in September those those rumors are true coming Xbox One and PC um but uh this is a game by Armature um with the help of KJ anun who the Creator Mega Man and Ani Musha and Dead Rising um and uh it's an interesting game I think that my reaction to it once we get into the actual gameplay after this this kind of intro is um it's kind of
